title: Ed-Care
description: Ed Care, an education-focused platform designed to provide students with accessible learning resources, academic guidance. Designed a unique, responsive UI for better user experience.

title: My-Shop
description: My-Shop is a modern and reliable e-commerce platform offering a wide range of high-quality products with a clean design and smooth shopping experience.

title: Dashboard
description: A fully responsive and interactive web dashboard built with React and Tailwind, featuring clean UI, data visualization, and quick access actions for admin and analytics.

title: Bangla-Cat
description: BanglaCAT is a fully responsive platform that provides detailed information on power solutions, heavy machinery, and marine engines.

title: Travels-Site
description: A travel website helps you explore destinations, find hotels, book flights, and plan trips easily, making your journey smooth and enjoyable.

title: Book-Vibe
description: A responsive React web application for discovering and managing books, featuring book details page, user login with authentication, profile editing, and add-to-cart functionality. Built with clean UI/UX, fast performance, and modern web technologies for a seamless user experience.
